name: Web Bookmarks Manager
description: Use this Notion page as a homepage for your browser, regardless of app or device!How does it work?This template will help you: Save commonly-used website using the Notion Web Clipper browser extension Tag sites by category Add Notion page to your browser as a homepage Why use this?If you use different browsers or devices, keeping track of your most used sites can get messy. Setting this page as your home (or main bookmark) ensures that if you make updates, they'll apply everywhere!What's include
features: Save commonly-used website using the Notion Web Clipper browser extension; Tag sites by category; Add Notion page to your browser as a homepage; Bookmarks Page Template; Instructions on using the Notion Web Clipper; Instructions on making it your homepage
